subject: Re: [junit] StrutsTestCase
msgSnippet: It can be very hard to figure out what is wrong when using StrutsTestCase. I would recommend that you make sure you ve set it up correctly, then make sure your
messageBody:
It can be very hard to figure out what is wrong when using
StrutsTestCase. I would recommend that you make sure you've set it up
correctly, then make sure your test can find both struts-config.xml
and web.xml, or you'll have problems.

jc
